item.title: All My Certificates
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <style> body { background-color: #000; color: #333; /* font-family: Arial, sans-serif; */ font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.5; margin: 0; padding: 0; } .container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 50px; border: 5px solid #0077b5; border-style: solid; } .certificates { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: space-between; margin-top: 50px; } //awais .certificate { flex-basis: calc(33.33% - 20px); background-color: #000; /* light gray */ color: #0000ff; margin-bottom: 40px; box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.

item.title: NFS Server: A Complete Guide to Setting Up and Configuring

item.title: Little bit About My Website
item.description: Highligthing the result I intend to place the results of various works on this webpage, highlighting the results of mini projects, ongoing projects, and more. So, for those who are reading, thank you! All of the work that I have been doing over the year,and months been extremely fun, eye opening, and a great experience altogether! #comments About Me A little bit about me. I love watching TV; Hopefully, that doesn’t scare you.
